lead_paragraph: With a new electronic-messaging system, pilots can receive a revised route from the control tower more quickly.

headline.print_headline: New Messaging System May Ease Takeoff Delays
headline.main: New Communication System, Tested at Newark Airport, Could Ease Takeoff Delays

snippet: With a new electronic-messaging system, pilots can receive a revised route from the control tower more quickly.
abstract: New electronic-messaging system, which has been tested at Newark Liberty International Airport, could reduce takeoff time for planes, ease delays and save jet fuel; system sends revised route data to pilots.
